titles.title: Electing certain minority members to certain standing committees.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

term.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform
House Committee on Science and Technology
House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 1/22/2009--Passed House without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Elects certain named Minority Members to specified House Committees.
